short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a moment to reflect on impulsive web browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delay access to websites you often visit by forcing yourself to sit through a timer before the page is revealed. Leave yourself a motivational or stern message to keep yourself on track.
